## Part 1

1. This color issue can be easily solved by moving "colour = "blue"" outside the aes()

ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy)) + geom_point(colour = "blue", aes()) + ggtitle("Scatter with Blue Points")
```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy)) + geom_point(colour = "blue", aes()) + ggtitle("Scatter with Blue Points")

```
